Name: dmcritchie
AboutMe:
Android Device: Feb, 2015 with Samsung Galaxy Tab 4, Model: SM-T230NU, Android version 4.4.2 (KitKat). Much faster than previous Lenovo - IdeaPad A1-07 Tablet 16GB Memory [Gingerbread 2.3.4] (7" tablet, 1024x600) ~2011-12-21.

Preferred browser on Android devices is Dolphin, and on Windows is Firefox.

Some Android, Android Bookmarklets, and Dolphin webpages of mine, followed by notes using Firefox on Windows.
